explains: adj. 封建（制度）的；过时（或老式）得可笑的；争吵的
wordGroup: feudal hierarchy 封建等级制度

sentences.en: Diplomacy was in his blood: his ancestors had been feudal lords.
sentences.cn: 他的外交能力是天生的：他的祖上曾是封建王侯。

sentences.en: This historical novel illustrates the breaking up of feudal society in microcosm.
sentences.cn: 这部历史小说是走向崩溃的封建社会的缩影。
